post:
OneAsiaHost is focused on providing unmanaged hosting services such as VPS/Dedicated Servers using an excellent network offered at low prices to enable customers across the world to not just easily tap into a vital Asian node but more importantly, to allow for a more cohesive interaction between other key locations across the globe. Our extensive network infrastructure gives you the best reach to countries in Asia such as China, Indonesia, Vietnam, India, Malaysia, Thailand, Philippines, Hong Kong, Taiwan, Japan, Korea, as well as direct connectivity into Australia, US and Europe.

Our networks routes are being constantly optimized based on customer feedback and we occasionally add new network providers to further reinforce our network and bandwidth capacity. We welcome our potential customers to contact us anytime with regards to route improvement in terms of latency and/or transfer speeds. If you feel that the latency/speed from your location to us is too high/slow, simply drop us a ticket and we'll try to improve it for you.

Panel: SolusVM
Datacenter: Global Switch, Singapore
Hardware: Intel i7-2600 Quad Core 3.4Ghz, 32GB RAM, 6x 1TB HDD Hardware RAID10
Sales/Support Hours: Within 48 hours (General) and within 4 hours between 9:30am-5:30pm SG time (GMT +0800)
SLA: 99.5% uptime guarantee, except during scheduled maintenance or denial of service attacks
Payment Method: Paypal Only
Refund: None

<u>Network Connectivity</u>
Network Speed: 100mbps per VPS
IP Addresses: 1x IPv4 (Additional IPv4 @ $3 USD monthly), 10x IPv6 (RDNS via SolusVM)
Upstream: SingTel, SingNet, PCCW, NTT
Native IPv6 support through SingTel, PCCW, NTT
Test IP: 116.251.210.1 , 2405:4200:202::1
<a href="http://bgp.he.net/AS24482#_asinfo">Network Information</a> || <a href="http://www.oneasiahost.com/speedtest/">Speed Test</a> || <a href="http://www.oneasiahost.com/lg/">Looking Glass</a> (ping/traceroute)

<u>Acceptable Use</u>
VPN, Proxy: Yes (Private Use Only)
Bittorrent, IRC, TOR, Adult Content: Not Allowed
